snippet: By selecting David Walker, a former top official at the Bank of England, Barclays is seeking to draw a line under the interest rate manipulation scandal, which has raised questions about the governance and the culture at the British bank.
abstract: By selecting David Walker, a former top official at the Bank of England, Barclays is seeking to draw a line under the interest rate manipulation scandal, which has raised questions about the governance and the culture at the British bank.

headline.print_headline: Longtime Banker Is Named New Chairman of Barclays
